layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x314
  RenderBlock {html} at (0,0) size 800x314
    RenderBody {body} at (8,16) size 784x290
      RenderBlock {p} at (0,0) size 784x16
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 189x16
          text run at (0,0) width 189: "TFOOT VALIGN=MIDDLE"
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,32) size 627x258 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {thead} at (1,1) size 625x24
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 625x20
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 204x20 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              RenderText {#text} at (2,2) size 55x16
                text run at (2,2) width 55: "THEAD"
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (208,2) size 415x20 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              RenderText {#text} at (2,2) size 55x16
                text run at (2,2) width 55: "THEAD"
        LayoutTableSection {tfoot} at (1,47) size 625x210
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,0) size 625x208
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,0) size 204x208 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              RenderImage {img} at (2,2) size 200x200
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (208,94) size 415x20 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              RenderText {#text} at (2,2) size 411x16
                text run at (2,2) width 372: "This text should be vertically aligned to the middle of the "
                text run at (373,2) width 40: "image"
        LayoutTableSection {tbody} at (1,25) size 625x22
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,0) size 625x20
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,0) size 204x20 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
